languages.text: {n}Кибергоргулья чуть склоняет голову на бок, будто в удивлении.{/n} "///Мы остановили их функции. Разве ты не выключаешь иногда машины? Мы не знаем пока, как включить человека обратно. Но если много экспериментировать — мы поймем. Мы всегда учимся новому!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибергоргулья чуть склоняет голову на бок, будто в удивлении.{/n} "///Мы остановили их функции. Разве ты не выключаешь иногда машины? Мы не знаем пока, как включить человека обратно. Но если много экспериментировать — мы поймем. Мы всегда учимся новому!"

languages.text: {n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"
languages.original_text: {n}Кибергоргулья чуть склоняет голову на бок, будто в удивлении.{/n} "///Мы остановили их функции. Разве ты не выключаешь иногда машины? Мы не знаем пока, как включить человека обратно. Но если много экспериментировать — мы поймем. Мы всегда учимся новому!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

{n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

{n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

{n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

{n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

languages.text: {n}サイバーガーゴイルは驚いたようにその頭を片側に傾けた。{/n}「///我々はその機能を止めました。時々、機械をオフにすることがあるでしょう？我々はどうやって人間をオンに戻すのか分かりません。まだ今は。けれどたくさん実験をしたら、分かります。我々はいつも何か新しいことを学んでいます！」
languages.original_text: {n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーガーゴイルは驚いたようにその頭を片側に傾けた。{/n}「///我々はその機能を止めました。時々、機械をオフにすることがあるでしょう？我々はどうやって人間をオンに戻すのか分かりません。まだ今は。けれどたくさん実験をしたら、分かります。我々はいつも何か新しいことを学んでいます！」

languages.text: {n}电子滴水嘴兽把头歪向一边，似乎很惊讶。{/n}“///我们只是停止了他们的功能，你有的时候不是也是会关掉机器吗？我们不知道如何把人复活，暂时还不知道，但经过足够多的实验，我们会学会的。我们总是在学习新东西！”
languages.original_text: {n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}电子滴水嘴兽把头歪向一边，似乎很惊讶。{/n}“///我们只是停止了他们的功能，你有的时候不是也是会关掉机器吗？我们不知道如何把人复活，暂时还不知道，但经过足够多的实验，我们会学会的。我们总是在学习新东西！”

languages.text: {n}Der Cybergargoyle lehnt den Kopf auf eine Seite, als sei er überrascht.{/n} "///Wir haben ihre Funktionen gestoppt. Schaltet Ihr denn nicht manchmal Maschinen aus? Wir wissen nicht, wie man einen Menschen wieder einschaltet. Noch nicht. Doch nach genügend Experimenten werden wir es wissen. Wir lernen ständig neue Dinge!"
languages.original_text: {n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cybergargoyle lehnt den Kopf auf eine Seite, als sei er überrascht.cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///Wir haben ihre Funktionen gestoppt. Schaltet Ihr denn nicht manchmal Maschinen aus? Wir wissen nicht, wie man einen Menschen wieder einschaltet. Noch nicht. Doch nach genügend Experimenten werden wir es wissen. Wir lernen ständig neue Dinge!"

languages.text: {n}La cybergargouille penche la tête sur le côté, comme si elle était surprise.{/n} « ///Nous avons interrompu leur fonctionnement. N'éteignez-vous pas les machines, parfois ? Nous ne savons pas encore comment rallumer les humains, mais avec nous ne tarderons pas à le découvrir en expérimentant. Nous apprenons sans cesse ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La cybergargouille penche la tête sur le côté, comme si elle était surprise.{/n} « ///Nous avons interrompu leur fonctionnement. N'éteignez-vous pas les machines, parfois ? Nous ne savons pas encore comment rallumer les humains, mais avec nous ne tarderons pas à le découvrir expérimentant. Nous apprenons sans cesse ! »

languages.text: {n}La cibergárgola ladea la cabeza como si estuviese sorprendida.{/n} «///Cesamos sus funciones. ¿Usted no apaga las máquinas de vez en cuando? Nosotros no sabemos cómo volver a encender a los humanos. Aún no. Pero lo averiguaremos si hacemos más experimentos. ¡Siempre estamos aprendiendo cosas!».
languages.original_text: {n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La cibergárgola ladea la cabeza como si estuviese sorprendida.{/n} «///Cesamos sus funciones. ¿Usted no apaga las máquinas de vez en cuando? Nosotros no sabemos cómo volver a encender a los humanos. Aún no. Pero lo averiguaremos si hacemos más experimentos. ¡Siempre estamos aprendiendo cosas!».

languages.text: {n}Sibergargoyl, şaşırmışçasına kafasını bir yana eğiyor.{/n} "///Fonksiyonlarını durdurduk. Siz de bazen makineleri kapatmaz mısınız? İnsanları nasıl tekrar çalıştıracağımızı bilmiyoruz. Henüz. Ancak yeterince deney yaparak öğreneceğiz. Sürekli yeni şeyler öğreniyoruz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The cybergargoyle tilts its head to one side like it is surprised.{/n} "///We stopped their functions. Do you not turn machines off sometimes? We do not know how to turn a human back on. Not yet. But after enough experiments, we will. We are always learning new things!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sibergargoyl, şaşırmışçasına kafasını bir yana eğiyor.{/n} "///Fonksiyonlarını durdurduk. Siz de bazen makineleri kapatmıyor musunuz? İnsanları nasıl tekrar çalıştıracağımızı henüz bilmiyoruz. Henüz. Ancak yeterince deney yaparak öğreneceğiz. Her daim yeni şeyler öğreniyoruz!"
